document_data.name: Gustofsen Eller
document_data.mainbody: '''Gustofsen Eller''' was the most renowned planar expert in the [[Realms]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History:
In his youth, Gustofsen witnessed his entire family slaughtered by cultists of [[Kali]], a goddess of another [[plane]].

Around 1357 DR, Gustofsen proclaimed he had killed the goddess Kali in her layer on the [[Abyss]]. An adventuring party was assembled in order to accompany Eller to verify this.
document_data.Personality: Gustofsen was obsessed with defeating Kali. He was a somewhat arrogant individual.
document_data.Relationship: Gustofsen taught his second cousin [[Inata Eller]].
